author: IGN
description:
IGN Fan Fest 2025: Fall Edition is here! The showcase kicks off at 9am PT / Noon ET with an exciting countdown that includes dozens of exclusive trailers and clips, followed by the main show at 10am PT / 1pm ET with even more trailers, gameplay, and celebrity interviews across movies, TV, and games. 

Fans can expect exclusive reveals from TV series' including Netflix's The Witcher, IT: Welcome to Derry, Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Deathwatch, and many more. On the movie side, we'll have reveals from Predator: Badlands, Black Phone 2, Frankenstein, Return to Silent Hill, and more! Lastly, on the games side, there will be over 50 exclusive game trailers from exciting titles including The Outer Worlds 2, Scott Pilgrim EX, Jurassic World Evolution 3, Where Winds Meet, WWE 2K25, Invincible VS, Squirrel with a Gun, and many others.

Make sure to also check IGN.com for all the reveals and news coverage as the show goes on! 

#IGN #Gaming #Movies
title: IGN Fan Fest 2025: Fall Edition Livestream – Predator: Badlands, WWE 2K25, The Witcher, and More

author: IGN
description: Watch the Live Action Focus Group Trailer for The Outer Worlds 2, an upcoming sci-fi action exploration RPG developed by Obsidian Entertainment. Players can get a look at the focus group meetings hosted by Ben Schwartrz for the upcoming sequel. The Outer Worlds 2 is launching on October 29 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.
title: The Outer Worlds 2 - Official Live Action Focus Group Trailer (Ft. Ben Schwartz, Marc Evan Jackson)

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Steam Next Fest Demo Trailer for SpongeBob SquarePants: Titans of the Tide, a 3D action-platformer developed by Purple Lamp. Players will explore the beloved SpongeBob SquarePants universe with a diverse set of locations across Bikini Bottom. Put an end to the chaos caused by the Flying Dutchman and King Neptune, alongside gaining access to Peggy the Pirate content and more by preordering. SpongeBob SquarePants: Titans of the Tide is launching on November 18 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam) with a demo available now on Steam.
title: SpongeBob SquarePants: Titans of the Tide - Official Steam Next Fest Demo Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Welcome to the indie.io Next Fest Party!

Join the celebration of indie creativity with 11 exciting demos featured in Steam Next Fest. From chaotic heists to cozy puzzles and chilling horror — this lineup brings a taste of the most unique upcoming games you can play right now.

Play the demos. Join the party. Wishlist your favorites.

Featured Games
Monsters and Me – Raise and befriend adorable creatures in a heartfelt adventure.

Dwarf Delve – Dig deep, uncover treasures, and survive the depths below.

Heistfest – Rob banks and outrun chaos in a high-octane action racer.

Kriophobia – Confront your fears in this haunting survival horror experience.

Plagun – Mutate, adapt, and fight infection in a slick sci-fi shooter.

Chowdown Kitty – Cook, serve, and cause adorable chaos in a feline food frenzy.

Air Hares – Soar through stylized skies in fast-paced aerial battles.

Binary Golf – Code meets creativity in this minimalist, logic-driven puzzler.

Nullstar Solus – Explore cosmic ruins
title: indie.io Next Fest Party - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest teaser trailer for the highly anticipated continuation of JoJo's Bizarre Adventure with part 7, STEEL BALL RUN. JJBA Steel Ball Run is only on Netflix coming 2026.

#IGN #Anime #Netflix
title: JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure: Steel Ball Run - Official Teaser Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Server Slam Teaser Trailer for ARC Raiders, an upcoming third-person extraction shooter developed by Embark Studios. Players will duke it out in a torn-up wasteland to scavenge for supplies, fight ARC enemies, and more before descending down below for safety. The ARC Raiders Server Slam is running from October 17 through October 19 on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store), with the game launching on October 30.
title: ARC Raiders - Official Server Slam Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Disney's Tron: Ares is glitching at the box office. The Jared Leto-led movie pulled in $33.5 million at the domestic box office during its opening weekend, lower than Leto's 2022 flop Morbius, which earned $39 million domestic in its opening weekend. Globally, Tron: Ares sits at just over $60 million, and faces a steep climb to earn back its $180 million production budget. In other movie news, Channing Tatum says his solo Gambit movie was a little too much for Disney. The movie was going to be an R-rated rom-com andwould've featured "mutants having sex." Gambit was stuck in development hell and eventually dropped, but Tatum was able to finally put on the Cajun accent for Deadpool & Wolverine. Tatum is also featured in the upcoming Avengers: Doomsday. And take a peek into a four-park family vacation at Universal Studios Florida, Universal Islands of Adventure, Universal Volcano Bay, and the newest park, Universal Epic Universe.

Presented by Universal Orlando Reso
title: Tron: Ares Had a Worse Opening Weekend than Morbius - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Stories about generational trauma are nothing new. They're also a great avenue for telling compelling stories. Which brings us to Guillermo del Toro’s Frankenstein.

Pretty much everyone knows the story of Frankenstein, and del Toro – who’s been trying to get a movie based on the iconic novel made for at least 20 years – doesn’t deviate from Mary Shelley’s work in any way that anyone but fans of the OG would notice. Some characters are missing, others are added, but the bones of the story remain intact: Man makes monster, man rejects monster, monster gets pissed off.

But more than just intact, these bones are also seemingly pulled from (carved out of?) Dr. Frankenstein’s choicest picks, his finest specimens, because this iteration of Frankenstein is, like its Creature, a beautiful, haunting thing through which classic themes are made to feel fresh and new.

Watch the video for our full review of Frankenstein, which is getting a limited release in theaters on October 17 followed by a
title: Frankenstein Review

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Predator: Badlands TV spot for this upcoming sci-fi action-adventure film starring Dimitrius Schuster-Koloamatangi and Elle Fanning. 

Set in the future on a deadly remote planet, Predator: Badlands follows a young Predator outcast (played by newcomer Dimitrius Schuster-Koloamatangi) who finds an unlikely ally in Thia (Emmy and Golden Globe nominee Elle Fanning) as he embarks on a treacherous journey in search of the ultimate adversary. 

Produced by John Davis, Dan Trachtenberg, Marc Toberoff, Ben Rosenblatt and Brent O’Connor, Predator: Badlands opens exclusively in movie theaters on November 7 in IMAX, Dolby Cinema, RealD (3D), Cinemark XD, 4DX, ScreenX and premium screens everywhere.
title: Predator: Badlands - Official Teaser Trailer (2025) Elle Fanning, Dimitrius Schuster-Koloamatangi

author: IGN
description: Berserk B.I.T.S gets a new trailer and a release date announcement. Watch the latest Berserk B.I.T.S for this upcoming idle-rpg, auto-battler, chip-collecting game that runs on your desktop. Let your B.I.T do battle and collect items. Collect rare chips and build your deck! Customize and Level up to take down intense Virus bosses as you unravel the mystery behind the attacks on the Net. Berserk B.I.T.S will be available on PC on November 20, 2025, and a demo is out now on Steam as part of Steam Next Fest.
title: Berserk B.I.T.S  - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Caiuajara Dinosaur Showcase Trailer for Jurassic World Evolution 3, the simulation dinosaur park strategy game developed by Frontier Developments. Players can get the rundown on the Caiuajara, an aerial-based creature originating from Brazil with a colorful design. Learn more about the Caiuajara in Jurassic World Evolution 3, launching on October 21 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).
title: Jurassic World Evolution 3 - Official Caiuajara Dinosaur Showcase Trailer

author: IGN
description: Watch the latest, creepy Reanimal teaser trailer for this horror adventure game. In Reanimal, a brother and sister go through hell to rescue their missing friends and escape the island that they used to call home. Play alone or grab a loved one to go through hell together in couch co-op mode. Reanimal will be available on PC, PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X/S, and Nintendo Switch 2. A demo is out now on Steam as part of Steam Next Fest.
title: Reanimal - Official Demo Trailer

author: IGN
description:
CJ and Austin from the Lumines Arise development team at Enhance walk you through a few minutes of the music-infused, block-dropping puzzle game whose origins date back to the PSP. Lumines Arise will launch on Steam and PS5 on November 11. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2370000/Lumines_Arise/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Lumines Arise: Exclusive Gameplay Commentary

author: IGN
description:
When fate calls and honor demands blood, will you resist Valhalla’s embrace? Learn more about the story of Norse: Oath of Blood in this latest trailer for the upcoming turn-based tactics game that plunges players into the heart of the Viking Age. The new Norse: Oath of Blood trailer also shows gameplay and what you can expect. Norse: Oath of Blood will be available on PC (GOG, Steam, and Epic Games Store), PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series X/S. A demo is out now on Steam as part of Steam Next Fest, available from October 13 to October 20, 2025.

Embark on an epic quest for vengeance as Gunnar, a young warrior whose destiny is forged in blood and betrayal. After the treacherous Steinarr Far-Spear murders his father, Jarl Gripr, and usurps his high seat, Gunnar's path is clear: rebuild, ally, and rise to reclaim honor and justice. 

Craft a settlement from the ground up, gather allies from far and wide, and train a formidable warband to stand by his side. Every decision shapes the wo
title: Norse: Oath of Blood - Official Story Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss 'The End of an Era' Docuseries Trailer for Taylor Swift: The Eras Tour, the hit 6-episode behind-the-scenes documentary about the legendary record-breaking tour from Taylor Swift. Experience the seminal event on December 12 streaming exclusively on Disney+.

“Taylor Swift | The Eras Tour | The End of an Era” is an illuminating docuseries on Disney+ that gives an intimate look at Taylor’s life as her tour made headlines and thrilled fans around the world. In addition, the series spotlights performers, family members, and friends – including Gracie Abrams, Sabrina Carpenter, Ed Sheeran, and Florence Welch – offering never-before-seen insight into what it took to create a phenomenon. Two episodes will debut each week beginning December 12.

Taylor Swift: The Eras Tour 'The End of an Era' Docuseries is streaming on December 12 exclusively on Disney+.

#TaylorSwiftTheErasTour #TaylorSwift #IGN
title: Taylor Swift: The Eras Tour - Official 'The End of an Era' Docuseries Trailer (2025)

author: IGN
description:
Our IGN First for October is Pearl Abyss’ Crimson Desert – the open-world action-adventure set in the fantasy continent of Pywel. Here, you can check out sections of a mission from the game's story that takes Kliff face-to-face with a giant mechanical dragon boss called Golden Star. 

We’ll have plenty more Crimson Desert to show you this month ahead of its March 19, 2026 release, including plenty more gameplay and insights from the development team.

#IGN #CrimsonDesert #IGNFirst
title: Crimson Desert: Golden Star Quest Gameplay - IGN First

author: IGN
description:
The Pokémon Company’s games have touched almost every genre, we’ve seen its characters rendered in almost every art style, and we’ve seen them battle a pantheon of gods and monsters. A universe of Pokémon games exists outside of the core series, and with Pokemon: Legends Z-A just around the corner, this is the perfect time to celebrate all the different ways the pocket monsters have deviated from their usual turn-based RPG roots, and rank the top 10 Pokemon spin-off games.

01:12 - Pokémon Ranger
02:34 - Pokémon Stadium 2
04:01 - Pokémon Colosseum
05:16 -  Pokémon XD: Gale of Darkness
06:50 -  Pokémon Conquest
08:09 - Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Blue Rescue Team
09:27 - Pokémon Snap
10:40 - Pokémon Go
12:00 - Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Explorers of the Sky
13:38 - Pokémon Legends: Arceus

#IGN #Pokemon #Top10
title: Top 10 Best Pokémon Spin-off Games Ranked

author: IGN
description:
Get a behind-the-scenes look at Predator: Badlands in this latest video for the upcoming sci-fi action adventure film. Predator: Badlands stars Dimitrius Schuster-Koloamatangi and Elle Fanning.

Set in the future on a deadly remote planet, Predator: Badlands follows a young Predator outcast (played by newcomer Dimitrius Schuster-Koloamatangi) who finds an unlikely ally in Thia (Emmy and Golden Globe nominee Elle Fanning) as he embarks on a treacherous journey in search of the ultimate adversary. 

Produced by John Davis, Dan Trachtenberg, Marc Toberoff, Ben Rosenblatt and Brent O’Connor, Predator: Badlands opens exclusively in movie theaters on November 7 in IMAX, Dolby Cinema, RealD (3D), Cinemark XD, 4DX, ScreenX and premium screens everywhere.

#PredatorBadlands #Movies #IGN
title: Predator: Badlands - Official 'Prey to None' Behind-The-Scenes Clip (2025) Elle Fanning

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Demo and Release Date Trailer for Of Ash and Steel, a third-person action-adventure medieval RPG developed by Fire & Frost. Players will explore the rundown lands of Grayshaft as Tristian, a once cartographer turned adventurer. Embark on dangerous quests, upgrade weapons and gear, and become the most renowned warrior in the land. Of Ash and Steel is launching on November 6 for PC (Steam and GoG) with a demo available now on Steam.
title: Of Ash and Steel - Official Demo and Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Play the game or the game plays you. Check out the new trailer for The Running Man, an upcoming movie starring Glen Powell, William H. Macy, Lee Pace, Michael Cera, Emilia Jones, Daniel Ezra, Jayme Lawson, Sean Hayes, Katy O’Brian with Colman Domingo and Josh Brolin.

In a near-future society, The Running Man is the top-rated show on television—a deadly competition where contestants, known as Runners, must survive 30 days while being hunted by professional assassins, with every move broadcast to a bloodthirsty public and each day bringing a greater cash reward. Desperate to save his sick daughter, working-class Ben Richards (Glen Powell) is convinced by the show’s charming but ruthless producer, Dan Killian (Josh Brolin), to enter the game as a last resort. But Ben’s defiance, instincts, and grit turn him into an unexpected fan favorite—and a threat to the entire system. As ratings skyrocket, so does the danger, and Ben must outwit not just the Hunters, but a nation addicted to watchi
title: The Running Man - Official Trailer #2 (2025) Glen Powell, William H. Macy, Lee Pace

author: IGN
description: Check out the Gameplay Trailer for Limit Zero Breakers, an upcoming anime action RPG developed by Vic Game Studios. Players can get a look at the game's flashy, stylized combat with a suite of different characters on a grand adventure by sailing through the skies to hunt the mythic ‘Library of the Gods’. Limit Zero Breakers is launching in 2026 for mobile and PC.
title: Limit Zero Breakers - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
We got an exclusive 45 minutes of hands-off time with Code Vein 2, and came out feeling confident that direct sequel or no, this follow-up feels like a far more fully realized vision of the fast-paced, flashy action RPG that Code Vein 1 was always striving to be. Previewed by Rebekah Valentine

#IGN #Gaming
title: Code Vein 2 Preview: New Moon, Same Blood
